name: Ristet
description:
RISTET IS A NEW TAKE ON TETRIS WHERE YOU CAN'T CONTROL THE FALLING PIECE BUT YOU CAN CONTROL THE BOARD.

SHIFT THE BOARD ARROUND, WRAPPING IT BOTH HORIZONTALLY AND VERTICALLY.

YOU CAN STILL HOLD A PIECE OR HARD DROP IF YOU WANT TO SPEED UP.

CAN YOU BECOME A MASTER OF THIS GAME?

GAME MADE FOR GMTK JAM 2020
